methods.name: fieldElementClicked
methods.comment:
Called when a field Field has been clicked.  The object being passed in may be
 of any type, as returned by the clicked field.  The type is guaranteed to be one of the
 types returned in the call to #getSupportedProgramLocations().

params.name: sourceNavigatable
params.comment: The source navigatable that was clicked upon.

params.name: programLocation
params.comment:
The location at the time the click was made. Due to swing delay, this
 location may not be the same as you would get if you asked the navagatable for the current
 location.SC

params.name: mouseEvent
params.comment: The mouse event that triggered the click

params.name: serviceProvider
params.comment: A service provider used to access system resources.

return.comment:
true if this handler wishes to have exclusive handling rights to processing the
         clickedObject

methods.javadoc:
Returns an array of types that this handler wishes to handle.
@return an array of types that this handler wishes to handle.
methods.name: getSupportedProgramLocations
methods.comment: Returns an array of types that this handler wishes to handle.

return.comment: an array of types that this handler wishes to handle.
